content:
I suggest renaming ZerothHomotopy to PathConnectedComponents.

  • I suspect such a rename will also increase discoverability.
  • It doesn't have a group structure defined (and I don't think it should)
  • While it is indeed Equiv to the 0th homotopy group (HomotopyGroup.Pi 0), the equivalence is a (trivial) theorem that shouldn't be reflected in the name
  • One might also claim we should just delete it, but having a concept from point-set topology defined without homotopies is nice to avoid heavy imports.

(I don't feel strongly about this, just thought I'd suggest it)

It doesn't have much API (Loogle) so a rename won't create many deprecations.
nit: I would use a singular form, because each element is a single component.
docs#ConnectedComponents currently also uses the plural form. maybe we should just rename both
Types should use the singular, or otherwise we'd have to pluralize the vast majority of the library...
Speaking of, Type and Sort themselves are not plural, so getting everything in line and plural would need a change in core!
